definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Polypropylene is used for standard clamps and Polyamide or Aluminum for special applications.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯是標準夾具和聚酰胺或特殊應用鋁的使用。

sentences.english: The research on suppression of gene transcription by polyamide was reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文總結了聚酰胺對特定基因轉錄抑制的研究進展。

sentences.english: The poly (amic acid) exhibited good solubility in common organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 該聚酰胺酸在普通有機溶劑中具有良好的可溶性。

sentences.english: Those polyamides used commercially are sufficiently stable to be spun from a melt.
sentences.chinese: 這些商業用的聚酰胺在熔融紡絲過程中十分穩定。

sentences.english: The as-spun fibers of PAA have been prepared by wet-spinning method under different coagulation conditions.
sentences.chinese: 爲聚酰胺酸溼法成形的凝固浴條件提供參考依據。

sentences.english: It's a solvent-free, two-component, polyamine cured epoxy paint.
sentences.chinese: 爲無溶劑厚漿雙組分聚酰胺固化的環氧塗料。

sentences.english: Based on the optimized condition, the two-step enrichment technology of flavonoid aglycones was studied.
sentences.chinese: 並研究了聚酰胺兩步法富集黃酮苷元的工藝條件。

sentences.english: Methods Polyamide thin layer chromatography is used to determine the spermidine content in urine.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用聚酰胺薄層層析法測定尿液精脒含量。

sentences.english: It's a two component, polyamide cured epoxy zinc rich primer.
sentences.chinese: 雙組份富鋅環氧聚酰胺固化的底漆。
雙組分，聚酰胺固化環氧富鋅底漆。

sentences.english: The high-crystalline Polyamide ranks as an engineering plastic.
sentences.chinese: 高晶度的聚酰胺屬於工程塑料。

sentences.english: Process for subsequent condensation of polycondensates, in particular of polyamide 6,6
sentences.chinese: 縮聚物，尤其是聚酰胺6，6後冷凝的方法。

sentences.english: The axial roller rows have machined cages or polyamide separators.
sentences.chinese: 軸向滾子具有機制的保持架或者聚酰胺分離器。

sentences.english: This article introduced the reprocess of polyamide hot melt adhesive for bonding lining cloth of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 具體介紹了服裝粘合襯布用聚酰胺熱熔膠的後加工。

sentences.english: Their cages are made of glass-fibre reinforced polyamide.
sentences.chinese: 它們的籠子是由玻璃纖維增強聚酰胺。

sentences.english: Both interfacial and solution-solid-phase polycondensation methods were used to synthesize PA-46, a novel engineering plastic.
sentences.chinese: 合成了高性能工程塑料聚酰胺46並進行了基本表徵。
